Topic.Title: Union entitlements are killing T

Message.Msg: It took a little longer for me to answer you. Had other things on the table. I was going to give you the long version as to why teachers unions are not in the best interests of the tax payers, but I won't because it's too lengthy. Here's what I will say though. Teachers are trained to teach. Parents are supposed to then take what their children have been TAUGHT in elementary schools and help them LEARN life's lessons. Once in high school, the children then begin the LEARNING process based on what they are being taught pretty much on their own. Assuming they go to college, then they have to cope with liberal professors foisting their values on young adult minds through teaching. My conclusion. Yes, teaching is important, but no one puts guns too the heads of a potential teacher. They know going in it is not a high paying job for grades K-12. People become teachers for the love of the job below the college/university level. So if the love of the job is the reason, why should taxpayers pay their lifetime retirement benefits? Let them SAVE as I did and prepare for life after teaching without being dependent on Taxpayers. That's a stiff price for taxpayers to pay for teaching a kid(s) for 10 months. Then, there is the matter of the funds that teachers unions collect going straight to a singular political party...after skimming the usual take. Sorry, but teachers unions are one union I can't get behind for a lot more reasons than I gave you Pep.

Topic.Title: Obama: "I AM NOT the Strapping Young Muslim Socialist I Use to Be!

Message.Msg: On February 4th, 2013, Vladimir Putin, the Russian president, addressed the Duma, (Russian Parliament), and gave a speech about the tensions with minorities in Russia: "In Russia live Russians. Any minority, from anywhere, if it wants to live in Russia, to work and eat in Russia, should speak Russian, and should respect the Russian laws. If they prefer Sharia Law, then we advise them to go to those places where that's the state law. Russia does not need minorities. Minorities need Russia, and we will not grant them special privileges, or try to change our laws to fit their desires, no matter how loud they yell 'discrimination'. We better learn from the suicides of America,England, Holland and France, if we are to survive as a nation. The Russian customs and traditions are not compatible with the lack of culture or the primitive ways of most minorities. When this honorable legislative body thinks of creating new laws, it should have in mind the national interest first, observing that the minorities are not Russians. The politicians in the Duma gave Putin a standing ovation for five minutes.

Topic.Title: Hey Mr. EE Hubcap...man of Peace...answer up.

Message.Msg: You are the most ignorant Troll I have ever encountered. That should make you proud. My "tirate" (sic) was simple. I wrote it for a simple minded Troll like you. I'll spell it out again for you. My entitlements were bought and paid for by me numb nut. I socked away contributions to a 401K every week and added supplemental non-matched funds. That's hardly an entitlement. I also put in the maximum allowable annual IRA contribution into my self-managed private IRA. That's not an entitlement either jerk-off. Do you want to make a case for Social Security that I paid into as being an entitlement? You probably would. To me, it's another form of investment. You put in and when the time comes, you take out. Not an entitlement as you see it. I am damn proud to have saved and invested to acquire a respectable estate that my children and grand-children will ultimately receive. So Mr. Troller, if you think I have leached ANYTHING, you're full of it. And if there are young people "busting their butts trying to make it", perhaps they didn't have parents helping and providing the guidance as I did every step of the way for our children. All have attained successful careers and most are unionized on police, county and nursing unions. No one but my wife and myself contributed to their development. No one. One thing for sure. If you have kids, I feel sorry for them in a way. I doubt you do anything to help them on the road to becoming productive citizens except troll your time away on a public message board. So you might as well prepare them to be busting their butts for a long time to come because you sir, are an idiot. Can't figure out how you became an EE. Unless you lied about that.

Message.Title: WSJ: Prepare for Obamacare Shock
Message.Msg: The Affordable Care Act will cause millions of Americans to pay more for their health insurance, lose their coverage, or have their work hours curtailed, according to Stanford business and law professor Daniel Kessler. Oliver Wyman consultants estimate that single adults aged 21-29 will endure a rate hike of 46 percent, even after premium assistance from tax credits. In addition, the Congressional Budget Office estimates that Obamacare will cause 3 million people to lose their insurance completely in 2014. And it expects that 6 million will have to pay the individual-mandate tax penalty in 2016, because they don't want or can’t afford coverage. In total, it appears that there will be 30 million to 40 million people damaged in some fashion by the Affordable Care Act

Topic.Title: Hey Mr. EE Hubcap...man of Peace...answer up.

Message.Msg: Mr Dave, What do you eat sticks and rocks? We harvest deer, hogs, turkey, quail, and dove. Trap #$%$, kill coyotes and armadillos as those are endorsed as negative predators by the wild turkey foundation, and make beer tracks at my camp. Btw my wife called them beer tracks as me and my friends were smashing beer cans around the fire. Had been showing her and the kids the different kinds of tracks on my 121 acres which I OWN and she made a funny that those circular indentations looked like "beer tracks" we all got a good laugh. I planted 80,000 pine trees 9 years ago and in 8 years we will make a pant load on pulp after the thinning and then the pole trees will be ready in 8 to 10 more. I invite disadvantaged childern with their parents to expose them to the woods and that life. Very satisfying to see one catch their 1st fish out of my lake or stand at the skinning rack with their game. Your tree hugging bs hit a nerve... You have no nerve you have a synapse problem me thinks... We hunt bow, black powder and general gun. We follow all the rules and enjoy every minute when not working and avoiding cry babies. I hated english and art. Math and science was my deal. Good luck with your outstanding success. Expect to see you in the journal soon. Peace The Capper. Yawn glad cramer is off. THE END.

Topic.Title: Union entitlements are constraining ATT

Message.Msg: Many things about CWA I didn't like but they and the company agreed to the contracts and they are legally binding. One example, many foremen would favor their pets and channel most of the OT to them. The union made them rotate the OT so all had a chance at it. I believe the company actually liked the contract work rules as most everyone agreed with them. Anyway, AT&T treated me well and enabled me to raise my family with a decent standard of living and retire without being a burden to my kids.

Topic.Title: Union entitlements are constraining ATT

Message.Msg: The main problem is the slave labor competition fropm places like China. The thieves that run most of American commerce let those goods into this country mostly duty free. Keep supporting those pols that refuse to stop this racket and we'll all be slaves soon.

Topic.Title: Union entitlements are constraining ATT

Message.Msg: I read of a steel company (small) that was employee owned years ago. They said people would RUN from one woek station to the next and would not tolerate slackers on the job. I saw too many slackers in PT&T in last few years I was there. It wasn't that way when I started in 1952.

Message.Title: Autism Awareness Month Closes
Message.Msg: Thank you all, especially those at&t employees who volunteered their time for the many autism fund raisers throughout the country this month. I am a supporter of Defeat Autism Now (D.A.N.) and became so with the support of legislation offered up in the House of Representatives in 2009. Many positive fund raising efforts took place this month, hopefully assisting in defeating autism. May the stock continue a journey bringing riches to all!

Message.Title: Yes, ricky
Message.Msg: Dan is my real name and this is my real former id. Good Luck! and Goodbye!!!!!!!! Thank you all for your support to defeat autism. This was a great month!!!!!!!! Sold my stock a few days ago and moved on!!! Good Luck!!!!!
